entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@narendramodi Sir sadar pranaam.
Tweeting first time to anyone in my lifetime. Sir want to inform you that we have sample from one of our customer based at Taiwan of Silver Ion - a nanoparticle that can be effectively used as a disinfectant to protect against coronavirus.
